remarks: Lemma for ~ iirevcn and related functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jun-2014.)
statement:
cnmptre.1 $e |- R = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
cnmptre.2 $e |- J = ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t A ) $.
cnmptre.3 $e |- K = ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t B ) $.
cnmptre.4 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
cnmptre.5 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ RR ) $.
cnmptre.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> F e. B ) $.
cnmptre.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. CC |-> F ) e. ( R Cn R ) ) $.
cnmptre $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> F ) e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
